data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Top Down Tokens - Dinosaurs
data.detailed_description:
This product is token module containing tokens for use with the Fantasy Ground virtual tabletop. Upon activating the module, the tokens will appear in your Token box for use throughout your game.

This token pack contains 48 tokens: This pack contains a variety of dinosaurs tokens. 24 of them are classical in appearance while the additional 24 are more fantastical versions.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: This product is token module containing tokens for use with the Fantasy Ground virtual tabletop. Upon activating the module, the tokens will appear in your Token box for use throughout your game. This token pack contains 48 tokens: This pack contains a variety of dinosaurs tokens.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x or 8x
  • Processor: 1 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x or 8x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
